basics.name: Yalın Pala
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer with hands-on experience designing, developing, and implementing applications and solutions using a range of technologies and programming languages.

work.summary: I work as a Backend, Frontend, Mobile and Full Stack developer in various projects.

details.text: In the Backend, I usually work with Mongodb or Postgresql as a database. Besides, I work with Express and Nest.
In the Frontend, I work with React, Nextjs
We use Jira and Git for job tracking and Agile methodology.

work.summary: I worked as a Full Stack developer.

details.text: I used React, React Native and Nodejs extensively in our projects.

work.summary: I have worked in a wide variety of projects.

details.comment: React, React Native, Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Nodejs.
